diff_hunk:
@@ -905,6 +909,11 @@
 - func: logsumexp_out(Tensor result, Tensor self, int64_t dim, bool keepdim=False) -> Tensor
   variants: function
 
+- func: masked_scale(Tensor self, Tensor mask, double scale) -> Tensor
body: Hmm I'm not 100% sure if we want this in our API. Generally those cases should be served by `torch.where`. I know it's slightly less efficient, but in the end this should just be generated by the JIT. I guess we could have it as a private method (`_masked_scale`)
body_html: Hmm I'm not 100% sure if we want this in our API. Generally those cases should be served by torch.where. I know it's slightly less efficient, but in the end this should just be generated by the JIT. I guess we could have it as a private method (_masked_scale)
